title: This NEEDS TO BE AN OFFICAL VI SKIN

embed.description: I decided to make a new skin for Vi ! Inspiration from Celtic's ambiances ! I make this illustration for Riot Games Art Contest 2014 ! www.polycount.com/forum/showth... Come here to watc...

body:
Not my design or anything, but I linked the person who made it. 

Lets push this into the eyes of some riot official so they can make this skin already!!!

also there are pictures of concepts of the vi skin, and they put a removable type hood with horns that would be awesome to see ingame as toggle

replies.body: {{champion:154}}  Hi, I'm Zac **sniff sniff** I want a new skin too qqqq

> [{quoted}](name=vQwaKe,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=iZXcJvxR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-25T10:54:46.110+0000)
>
> {{champion:154}}  Hi, I'm Zac **sniff sniff** I want a new skin too qqqq

no zac. you don't even have skin.
Since it was for a Riot Games Art Contest I'd assume somebody at Riot already saw it when they picked out the winners.
